artist: Painter: After Rembrandt Harmensz. van Rijn
description: two images on mount; Top: elderly peasant with cane and tall hat; facing left (reverse of original) lower image: landscape: settlement at left on a stream; pathe at right with man carrying two buckets on a yoke; dog running beside man; water at right with sail boats

11 15/16 × 9 11/16 in. (30.32 × 24.61 cm) (mount)
